content: stitch them or create the eyes by tying a french knot 8-13 1 double_crochet in each double_crochet of previous round 20 14 1dc in 3 next sts decrease repeat x 4 16 stuff your mouse now before decreasing any more insert bell or catnip if you wish to use them 15 1dc in 2 next sts decrease repeat x 4 12 16 decrease repeat x 6 6 17 skip next stitch slip_stitch in next st repeat x 3 18 make 20 chain sts to create the tail tie a knot and fasten_off yarn ears make 2 using the 3mm crochet hook 1 2 chain 6 double_crochet in first chain 6 2 2dc in each st around 12 fasten_off leaving a long yarn tail to use when stitching onto the mouse for big round ears stitch the ears on as they are or if you want smaller ears fold the ears in half and bend them into crescents and stitch on in this way your mouse cat-toy is complete to make a more exciting mouse experiment with a bell or pouch of dried catnip inside copyright © baldmoose 2019 this pattern is an original design my baldmoose you may not sell this pattern you may not distribute it or put it up for public use please feel free to sell any of your own handmade items made from this pattern so long as the listing description states that it is based on a baldmoose pattern adding in a link to my store would also be appreciated https //www ravelry com/designers/bald-moose https //www instagram com/baldmoose_handmade/ https //www facebook com/baldmoose https //felt co nz/shop/baldmoose www etsy com/nz/shop/baldmoose copyright © baldmoose 2019
